## Block.getPreviousBlock() method

Returns the block connected to the previous connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPreviousBlock(): Block | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Block](./blockly.block.md) \| null

The previous statement block or null.
